column3: News;Kampot:------  A fire broke out in a Kampot market at 9:10 pm on December 6
column5: Kampot province.------The blaze was extinguished by four fire trucks
column6: and was put out at 12 pm. 16 stalls were destroyed.------The cause of the fire is thought to be from unsafe electrical installations. Nobody was injured.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/393443
